europeana:record.dc:title: Berichte des naturwissenschaftlichen-medizinischer Verein Innsbruck S1 (1992)

europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Edward Holt Eason: On the Taxonomy and Geographical Disribution of the Lithobiomorpha. 1- 9. Helen J. Read: The Generic Composition of the Cylindroiulini. 11- 14. Ariane Pedroli-Christen, Adolf Scholl: Systematics and Taxonomy of the Genus Rhymogona. Morphological and Genetic Studies indicating Synonymy of Rhymogona montivaga (Verhoeff) and R. silvatica (Rothenbühler) (Diplopoda, Craspedosomatidae). 15. Age Simonsen: Importance of Polydesmidean Millipedes for the Reconstruction of the Palaeogeographic Evolution of Eastern Gondwanaland in the Permo-Triassic. 17- 22. Jean-Paul Mauriés: Sur la vraie place du genre Protosilvestria Handschin dans la classification des Diplopodes Iuliformes (Iuliformia, Iulida, Cambalidea). 23- 31. Paul A. Selden, Andrew J. Jeram: Myriapods and Arachnids from the Upper Silurian Ludlow Bone Bed. UK: the Earliest Land Animals. 33. William A. Shear, Paul A. Selden: A Myriapod Identity for the Devonian "Scorpion" Tiphoscorpio hueberi. 35- 36. Alessandro Minelli: Towards a New Comparative Morphology of Myriapods. 37- 46. Henrik Enghoff: The Size of a Millipede. 47- 56. Bruno Condé, Monique Nguyen Duy-Jacquemin: Découverte d'un caractère sexuel secondaire nouveau chez le male d'un Polyxénidé (Myriapodes, Pénicillates). 57- 62. Anne Thorez, Philippe Compere, Gerhard Goffinet: Ultrastructure and Mineral Composition of the Tergite Cuticle of the Iulid Millipede Ophyiulus pilosus (Myriapoda, Diplopoda). 63- 70. Stephen P. Hopkin, Hugh S. Anger: On the Structure and and Function of the Glue-Secreting Glands of Henia vesuviana (Newport, 1845) (Chilopoda: Geophilomorpha). 71- 79. Catherine Jamault-Navarro: Sur la Présence d'une Structure Rhabdomérique Localisée Intracérébralement dans le Protocérébron de Lithobius forficatus L. (Myriapode, Chilopode). 81- 86. Carol Constantin Prunescu: The Genital System in Dichelobius (Anopsobiidae, Lithobiomorpha, Chilopoda). 87- 91. Carol Constantin Prunescu: The Beginning of Double Spermatogenensis in Scutigera coleoptrata (Chilopoda). 93- 97. Beatrice Peruffo: Methods for the Study of Living Glomeris Embryos. 99. Willi E.R. Xylander: Immune Defense Reactions of Myriapoda - A Brief Presentation of Recent Results. 101- 110. Michel Descamps: Endocrine Events during the Life Cycle of Lithobius forficatus L. (Myriapoda, Chilopoda). 111- 116. Michel Descamps, Marie-Chantal Fabre, Jean Luc Baert: Identification and Partial Characterization of vitellin and vitellogenin from Scolopendra cingulata Latreille (Myriapoda, Chilopoda). 117- 121. Monique Nguyen Duy-Jacquemin: Contribution à l'étude du développement postembryonnaire d'Anadenobolus leucostigma martinicensis (Chamberlin, 1918). Note préliminaire (Diplopoda, Spirobolida). 133- 140. Maija Peitsalmi, Ilmari V. Pajunen: Mapping the Ocular Field in Proteroiulus fuscus (Am Stein) (Diplopoda, Blaniulidae). 141. Jean-Francois David: Some Questions about the Evolution of Life - History traits in Diplopoda. 143- 152.
